# Vorbereitung

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```



# Daten laden

```{r}
data_url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sebastiansauer/willingness-vaccination-covid19/main/data/d3.csv"

d3 <- read_csv(data_url)  # wohnt im tidyverse
```



```{r}
d3 %>% 
  summarise(willingness = mean(willingness, na.rm = TRUE))
```
